content: are you looking for the perfect scarf for any occasion look no further than relaxing waves scarf no matter your individual style this unisex crochet pattern is easy to customize with vibrant color options that will perfectly fit in with your wardrobe with this crochet pattern you ll be creating a gorgeous one-of-a-kind creation that radiates coziness and warmth you ll be able to work up this scarf quickly and without any difficulty no worrying about decreasing or increasing or skipping stitches instead this pattern works up in simple easy-to-follow long row and utilizes basic stitches therefore with just a 4 row repeat you ll be able to craft the perfect relaxing waves scarf not only is this a gorgeous creation that is perfect for your wardrobe it s also a great unisex gift idea for anyone in your life this scarf makes for an easy - and stylish - crochet project and it s sure to be a hit for years to come don t wait to get started on your own relaxing waves scarf let me help you make something special and beautiful today ❤ layout my patterns all share the same layout which is easy to read and easy to find important information you need such as materials needed sizing information gauge information and special stitches used as well as how to do them ❤ size this pattern is written for 10 sizes age 3-5 age 5-7 age 8-10 teen women s sm women s med women s lge men s sm men s med men s lge ❤ materials #4 weight yarn of your choosing i used 3 skeins of paintbox simply aran in total for all but the mens large that is 200 yards of each of 3 colours approximate yardage for each size is included in the pattern 5mm hook stitch markers optional scissors tapestry needle
